name: Chk-InCam-AdvancedSkills
0:
”Alexa open Check Inn Cam”
”Alexa, ask Check Inn Cam the status of my camera”
”Alexa, ask Check Inn Cam to turn on camera”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: check inn cam
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa, you can control your Chk-In camera using voice commands.

To pair your camera with Amazon Echo or Echo Dot, please do the following, 
1. Launch Alexa app
2. Go to skills and find "Chk-In Cam - Advanced Skills"
3. Click Enable and enter User Name and Password when prompted.
4. Click Authorize to allow Alexa to connect to your cameras
5. Done. 

Now you can control your camera with your voice.
- Turn your camera ON or OFF, and
- Arm your camera when it detects loud sound or motion, and
- Playback event recordings
